com.esri.mo2.file.shp
Interface ShapeM

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, Shape
All Known Subinterfaces:
ShapeZ
All Known Implementing Classes:
MultiPointMShp, MultiPointZShp, PointMShp, PointZShp
public interface ShapeM
extends Shape

This class declares the methods that are common to all non-multipart shapes with Measures. The starting index for points is 0.

Method Summary
 double[] getM()
          Returns the Measures for all points in the shape
 double getMAt(int pntIndex)
          Returns the Measure of the point at the specified index.
 double[] getRangeM()
          Returns the min and max values of the Measures of the shape.
 void setM(double[] m)
          Sets the Measures of all points in the shape.
 void setMAt(int pntIndex, double m)
          Sets the Measure of the point at the specified index.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.esri.mo2.file.shp.Shape
clone, getNumPoints, getRangeX, getRangeY, getX, getXAt, getY, getYAt, setNumPoints, setX, setXAt, setY, setYAt
